title: Language Project Design and Execution in CMS-Based Blended Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic CMS (Learning Management System) usage experience and intermediate+ language proficiency
context.additional_context: Integration of CMS Tools Using Learners' Personal Devices (BYOD), Operating Weekly Hybrid Online/Offline Sessions

learning_goals: Learners adaptively utilize CMS tools (discussion boards, resource repositories, assignment submission systems) according to project-phase requirements
Learners complete language projects by linking online-offline activities in blended learning environments
Learners evaluate their tool usage patterns and develop improvement strategies based on CMS analytics data
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
